about_the_game: The General Electric C44-9CW (C44-9W, Dash 9-44CW, or simply Dash 9), is a type of 4,400hp six-axle diesel locomotive built from 1993 to 2004. The Dash 9 superceded the Dash 8, and more than 3,500 units were built. This model sports the BNSF Heritage 2 paint Scheme.
detailed_description: The General Electric C44-9CW (C44-9W, Dash 9-44CW, or simply Dash 9), is a type of 4,400hp six-axle diesel locomotive built from 1993 to 2004. The Dash 9 superceded the Dash 8, and more than 3,500 units were built. This model sports the BNSF Heritage 2 paint Scheme.
legal_notice: Published and developed by N3V Games Pty Ltd . N3V Games, Trainz and their respective logos are trademarks of N3V Games.  All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.
